sect2.title: Contenu
sect2.para: La base de données relationnelle PostgreSQL contient createdb, createlang, createuser, dropdb, droplang, dropuser, ecpg, initdb, initlocation, ipcclean, pg_config, pg_ctl, pg_dump, pg_dumpall, pg_passwd, pg_restore, pgaccess, pgtclsh, pgtksh, postgres, postmaster, psql et vacuumdb.

sect3.title: createdb
sect3.para: createdb creates a new PostgreSQL database.

sect3.title: createlang
sect3.para: createlang defines a new PostgreSQL procedural language.

sect3.title: createuser
sect3.para: createuser defines a new PostgreSQL user account.

sect3.title: dropdb
sect3.para: dropdb removes a PostgreSQL database.

sect3.title: droplang
sect3.para: droplang removes a PostgreSQL procedural language.

sect3.title: dropuser
sect3.para: dropuser removes a PostgreSQL user account.

sect3.title: ecpg
sect3.para: ecpg is the embedded SQL preprocessor.

sect3.title: initdb
sect3.para: initdb create a new database cluster.

sect3.title: initlocation
sect3.para: initlocation creates a secondary database storage area.

sect3.title: ipcclean
sect3.para: ipcclean removes share memory and semaphores left over by an aborted database server.

sect3.title: pg_config
sect3.para: pg_config retrieves PostgreSQL version information.

sect3.title: pg_ctl
sect3.para: pg_ctl controls stopping and starting the database server.

sect3.title: pg_dump
sect3.para: pg_dump dumps database data and metadata into scripts which are used to recreate the database.

sect3.title: pg_dumpall
sect3.para: pg_dumpall recursively calls pg_dump for each database in a cluster.

sect3.title: pg_passwd
sect3.para: pg_passwd is a secondary password file utility, for controlling access to databases.

sect3.title: pg_restore
sect3.para: pg_restore creates databases from dump files created by pg_dump.

sect3.title: pgaccess
sect3.para: pgaccess is a graphical client for PostgreSQL, written in Tk/tcl.

sect3.title: pgtclsh
sect3.para: pgtclsh is a tcl shell for PostgreSQL.

sect3.title: pgtksh
sect3.para: pgtksh is a wish style shell for PostgreSQLL.

sect3.title: postgres
sect3.para: postgres is a single user database server, generally used for debugging.

sect3.title: postmaster
sect3.para: postmaster is the multiuser database daemon.

sect3.title: psql
sect3.para: psql is a console based database shell.

sect3.title: vacuumdb
sect3.para: vacuumdb compacts databases and generates statistics for the query analyzer.
